quote: This is for you... and for me. Nope. I don't mean anything by it!
Is anything that isn't strawberry-flavored worth eating? You're welcome.
Here you go. Well, would you look at that? The perfect match.

What? You've never received milk from trick-or-treatin before? Well... Well, how old are you exactly? Maybe it's been a while since you last went trick-or-treating? I'm kidding. You're cool and hip. Now take the milk!
There's no alcohol in this. I promise.
Okay, in all seriousness, this is probably the best you're going to get from me. You're welcome. Now where's *my* candy?
